comments:
M7 build I20040217

Open the workbench to the Java perspective
- ran an inner workbench and closed it 
- from the Java perspective tried to open the Debug view via the 
Window > Show View menu
- when the Show View dialog opened double clicked on Debug and then double 
clicked on the sub item debug and the following exception occured.

correction, use Window > Show View > Other... to open the dialog
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 52248 ***
